sentences.english: In the lyrics does not have the shadow evil spirit to bond, do not place on the heart.
sentences.chinese: 歌词中没有阴影魔障，千万不要放在心上。

definition: karmic hindrance (buddhism)/karmic consequences that stand in the way of enlightenment/(term of abuse, especially toward the younger generation) devil spawn/(fig.) money
to be obsessed with sth/to go overboard/(Buddhism, Taoism) to misguidedly focus on hallucinations that arise during meditation
variant of 磨難|磨难[mo2 nan4]
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
lit. sea of bitterness/abyss of worldly suffering (Buddhist term)/depths of misery
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
to achieve supreme enlightenment or nirvana (Buddhism)
